# believe_quotes (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_quotes" "example_quotes" {
  character_id = "character_id"
  funny = true
  inspirational = true
  moment_type = "halftime_speech"
  theme = "belief"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `character_id` (String) Filter by character
- `funny` (Boolean) Filter funny quotes
- `inspirational` (Boolean) Filter inspirational quotes
- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `moment_type` (String) Filter by moment type
Available values: "halftime_speech", "press_conference", "locker_room", "training", "biscuits_with_boss", "pub", "one_on_one", "celebration", "crisis", "casual", "confrontation".
- `theme` (String) Filter by theme
Available values: "belief", "teamwork", "curiosity", "kindness", "resilience", "vulnerability", "growth", "humor", "wisdom", "leadership", "love", "forgiveness", "philosophy", "romance", "cultural-pride", "cultural-differences", "antagonism", "celebration", "identity", "isolation", "power", "sacrifice", "standards", "confidence", "conflict", "honesty", "integrity".

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `character_id` (String) ID of the character who said it
- `context` (String) Context in which the quote was said
- `episode_id` (String) Episode where the quote appears
- `id` (String) Unique identifier
- `is_funny` (Boolean) Whether this quote is humorous
- `is_inspirational` (Boolean) Whether this quote is inspirational
- `moment_type` (String) Type of moment when the quote was said
Available values: "halftime_speech", "press_conference", "locker_room", "training", "biscuits_with_boss", "pub", "one_on_one", "celebration", "crisis", "casual", "confrontation".
- `popularity_score` (Number) Popularity/virality score (0-100)
- `secondary_themes` (List of String) Additional themes
- `text` (String) The quote text
- `theme` (String) Primary theme of the quote
Available values: "belief", "teamwork", "curiosity", "kindness", "resilience", "vulnerability", "growth", "humor", "wisdom", "leadership", "love", "forgiveness", "philosophy", "romance", "cultural-pride", "cultural-differences", "antagonism", "celebration", "identity", "isolation", "power", "sacrifice", "standards", "confidence", "conflict", "honesty", "integrity".
- `times_shared` (Number) Number of times shared on social media
